name: Daily Planner
about: A daily planner which saves your data and colors each hour element based on the time of pageload.

name: Weather Dashboard
about: A dashboard where you can enter your location and find the current weather as well as 5 day forecasts.

name: Weather Event Planner
about: App that finds weather in a given area and presents the user with activities appropriate for the weather.

name: ReadMe Generator
about: An app to create easier ReadMe files through the terminal in Visual Studio Code.

name: Note Taker
about: A notepad app which allows the user to save, retrieve, and edit notes from a database.

name: Inventory Keeper
about: Full stack application to keep track of inventory in a database. Themed after NASA for fun.
